abstract: Representative Michele Bachmann gave a speech Saturday about the burdens illegal immigration places on American taxpayers and signed a pledge to build a "secure double fence" the border with Mexico.
snippet: Representative Michele Bachmann gave a speech Saturday about the burdens illegal immigration places on American taxpayers and signed a pledge to build a "secure double fence" the border with Mexico.
lead_paragraph: PERRY, Iowa - Representative Michele Bachmann gave one of the great stem-winding speeches of her campaign Saturday about the burdens illegal immigration places on American taxpayers, and she signed a pledge to build a "secure double fence" along every foot of the border with Mexico.

headline.main: Bachmann Goes After Perry on Immigration and Pledges Border Fence
